text:
e="preserve">Håkan Lennart Jeppsson (6 May 1961 – 7 December 2018) was a Swedish businessman. He was the Chairman of the Swedish Association football club Malmö FF from 2010 until his death in 2018. Jeppsson studied at Lund University. He was born in Malmö, Sweden.
Jeppsson died on 7 December 2018 at the age of 57.
